compounddef.title: MCUMgr hooks for Full Modem Firmware Upgrade stats

briefdescription.para: Setup and register the command handlers responsible for communicating SMP buffer sizes.

detaileddescription.para: This functions setups the stat group for mcumgr so that the serial modem module update script can negotiate the SMP protocol frame size.

parameterdescription.para: on success, negative integer on failure.

briefdescription.para: Full Modem Firmware Update(FMFU) statistics for MCUMgr over SMP.

detaileddescription.para: This registers a handler for the MCUMgr stat command to report back the SMP protocol MTU and frame size.
